thread.title: "Jurassic Park" Is Really A Movie About Butts
thread.title_full: "Jurassic Park" Is Really Just A Movie About Butts

author: Crystal Ro
title: "Jurassic Park" Is Really A Movie About Butts
text:
View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786446 2. And he invites paleontologist butt and paleobotanist butt to his ~fancy~ new dino park. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786450 3. The dino park, meanwhile, is being set up by these worker butts… View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786455 4. …and their boss, Australian butt. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786468 5. Then, shockingly, THIS poor butt gets killed by one of the dinos. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786502 6. Elsewhere, a secret meeting takes place as a local butt watches nearby. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786607 7. After arriving at the park, paleontologist butt nearly passes out when he actually sees a dino. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786682 8. Lawyer butt and Goldblum butt join the group, where they get a quick tour of the visitor’s center. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786734 9. And then rich butt is like, “peace, I’m out, enjoy your tour.” View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786847 10. Which, of course, they don’t because this goat butt is like, “LOL, no show today!” View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786889 11. Then paleobotanist butt splits off to investigate what’s wrong with this triceratops’ butt. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10786955 12. Later, some of the butts get into trouble when T-Rex butt shows up. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787013 13. But paleontologist butt saves them… View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787060 14. …WELL, except for lawyer butt (sorry, lawyer butt). View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787090 15. And then these lucky butts narrowly escape a falling jeep. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787107 16. Meanwhile, bad guy butt gets killed off by another dinosaur. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787135 17. Eventually, this butt figures out how to get the park back on line. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787204 18. And these butts get to enjoy watching some dinosaurs run… View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787214 19. …and then enjoy running away from them. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787230 20. Elsewhere, paleobotanist butt runs off to fix the power… View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787239 21. …and then finally makes it back to the visitor’s center to warn the others. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787289 22. The butts all get into trouble again when some velociraptors show up… View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787319 23. …but it all turns out okay in the end because good ol’ T-Rex butt shows up again, this time to literally save their asses. View this image ›
Universal ID: 10787351
